snippet: This weekend, as the L.P.G.A. heads into the year’s final major, the Women’s British Open, Stacy Lewis has the chance to record the finest season by an American woman in nearly two decades.
abstract: Stacy Lewis is preparing for the Women's British Open, the final major of the LPGA season; Lewis has the chance to record the finest season by an American woman in nearly two decades.
lead_paragraph: This weekend, as the L.P.G.A. heads into the year’s final major, the Women’s British Open, Stacy Lewis has the chance to record the finest season by an American woman in nearly two decades.

headline.seo: Golfer Stacy Lewis Could End U.S. Drought at British Open
headline.main: Women’s Golf Money Leader Could End U.S. Drought
headline.print_headline: Women’s No. 2 Earner May End U.S. Drought
